properties.entry: UPDATE ROOM SET STATUS='N' WHERE ROOM_NO = ?

SELECT R.RV_NO, M.ROOM_NAME, U.USER_NAME, R.RV_PEOPLE, R.RV_DATE, R.RV_CONFIRM, R.RV_PAYMENT, R.RV_REQUEST, B.AMOUNT B_AMOUNT, P.AMOUNT P_AMOUNT FROM RESERVATION R JOIN ROOM M ON R.ROOM_NO=M.ROOM_NO JOIN USERINFO U ON R.USER_ID=U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN RVBANK B ON R.RV_NO=B.RV_NO LEFT JOIN RVPAYMENT P ON R.RV_NO=P.RV_NO WHERE R.RV_NO = ?
SELECT RV_NO, ROOM_NAME, USER_ID, RV_PEOPLE, RV_DATE, RV_CONFIRM, RV_PAYMENT, RV_REQUEST FROM RESERVATION JOIN ROOM USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? ORDER BY RV_DATE DESC
